trans-unit.source: Abstract class that, when implemented represents a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"></xref> that may contain a collection of child <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"></xref> objects.
A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup> can be a child of another <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup"></xref> class, with default properties.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup"></xref>.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup"></xref>.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup"></xref>.
Adds a child <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"></xref> to this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup"></xref>.
The object to be added as the child of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup"></xref>.

If this object is a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"></xref> it will be added to the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup.Children"></xref> collection; otherwise, an exception will be thrown.
The parameter child is not a .
Adds a text string as a child of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"></xref>.

A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline> does not accept text as a child, so this method will raise an InvalididOperationException unless a derived class has overridden this behavior which allows text to be added.
The text added to the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"></xref>.
Creates a type-specific clock for this timeline.
If a derived class overrides this method, it should only create and return an object of a class inheriting from <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>.
A clock for this timeline.
Gets or sets the collection of direct child <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"></xref> objects of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup"></xref>.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
Child <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"></xref> objects of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup"></xref>.
The default value is **null**.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup.Children"></xref> dependency property.
The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup.Children%2A> dependency property.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.
The cloned object's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property will be `false` even if the source's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property was `true.`
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.
The cloned object's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property will be `false` even if the source's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property was `true`.
Instantiates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockGroup"></xref> object, using this instance.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockGroup"></xref> object.
Adds a child object.
The child object to add.
Adds the text content of a node to the object.
The text to add to the object.
